Module com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression
Package com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.tree

Class Node<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.tree.Tree<T>
      • com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.tree.Node<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Tree<T>>
    public class Node<T>
extends Tree<T>
    An interior node in a Huffman tree, having a left and right sub-tree. The frequency of the node is the sum of the frequencies of the sub-trees. A symbol can be decoded with decode(BitReader).
